acceptance-test-run.title: Running multiple factories should lead to different results
acceptance-test-run.name: Running multiple factories should lead to different results

tag.name: Podam Factory should be thread safe As a user I want Podam Factory to be thread-safe So that I can run multiple factories simultaneously
Factory thread safety/Podam factory should be thread safe

test-step.description: Given I have an executor service with {2} threads and a callable which returns a String

test-group.name: When I invoke the executor service for each thread
Then I should receive {2} distinct results
